name: Child Support Voice Response
description: Kentucky Child Support services - NOTE: The automated voice response system (800) 443-1576 has been discontinued. Child support customers should now use the Kentucky Child Support Interactive website for payment and account information. For assistance with online access, call (800) 248-1163. Services include child support case management, payment processing, account balance information, and case status updates.
source: Verified from official Kentucky Child Support website and cross-referenced with multiple sources
notes: IMPORTANT UPDATE: The automated voice response system (800) 443-1576 has been discontinued. Child support customers must now use the Kentucky Child Support Interactive website (https://kentuckychildsupport.ky.gov/) for payment and account information. For assistance with online access or case information, call (800) 248-1163. The service is administered by the Kentucky Division of Child Support within the Cabinet for Health and Family Services. Main administrative office located in Frankfort, KY. Services available statewide.
